name: Richard
description:
I am a very outgoing and fun filled person. I like to explore the world by traveling to different countries and learning about their culture and ambitions. I also have high ambitions, I want to be a good person and every day I try to do something that will bring me closer to this goal.
I want to love and share my world with the woman of my dream. I am looking for a serious relationship love leading to marriage. Looking for a woman who is ready to make me happy positively, charming, funny, romantic, Lovely with respect and understanding.
